website_summaries.verdict: A small countertop kegerator that works in almost any space.
pros: This is one of the least expensive kegerators available and makes for a great first kegerator
Customers love how quick and easy setup is
Despite the size, this kegerator does not struggle to reach temperature as low as 37° Fahrenheit
cons: Because this kegerator takes 5-liter kegs, finding compatible beers in the U.S. can be difficult

customer_reviews.title: My brother loves it
customer_reviews.text: It was fairly easy to setup and use. The only two things against it is the temp doesn’t get much colder than 37 degrees so if you like your beer ice cold, I suggest pairing with a mug out of the freezer. The other thing, and this isn’t against the product or company, is liquor stores don’t refer to these kegs by actual size and each one calls it a different name so it was hard finding a keg to fit but I will be doing some research to rectify that.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremi Lamberson

customer_reviews.title: Great Kegerator, but 5 Liter Kegs Dont Exist in US
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product and does exactly what it's supposed to. Just a heads up though, here in the US, 5 liter kegs are super rare. So getting that favorite beverage in a 5 liter(or mini keg) isn't going to happen without some serious work. Recommend the next size up if in US.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B. Muller

customer_reviews.title: Great fro Heinkein
customer_reviews.text: Great for heineken; doesn't really work for other kegs and mine broke
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised, Had used pressurized and no-pressurized mini ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised, Had used pressurized and non-pressurized mini kegs, with included hardware and CO2, without any problem. It keeps the keg at a constant 40 degrees and just adjust CO2 pressure, 5 seconds on ( +) then return to ( -) to prevent too much frothing. The fan is on the loud side, (thus the 4 stars) when its on, but shuts down when it reaches the desired temperature.
customer_reviews.author: A. J.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Best item I’ve purchased keeps beef cold and added carbonation to my high ABV homebrew I couldn’t carbonate with normal sugar and yeast
customer_reviews.author: scott mousseau

customer_reviews.title: A total waste of money and a spoiled birthday present.
customer_reviews.text: This kegerator has not worked since we bought it. It was a birthday present and a terrible disappointment. It was a large waste of money. Do not buy this kegerator.
customer_reviews.author: Bud S

customer_reviews.title: The item was came broke and won’t return...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product that can’t be returned to seller.... Seller won’t honor return wants me to call manufacturer don’t buy from this seller and kind of device or electronic
customer_reviews.author: Chad Hupp

customer_reviews.title: Does not get cold enough
customer_reviews.text: The unit does not get colder then 51 degrees. Another unit was sent and it gets down to 50 degrees so same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Zorn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy w/this unit. It's easy to clean, change mini-kegs and operate. I chill the mini-keg before loading it into the kegerator where the temperature is kept in the high 30's (according to the display).
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a common gift to give.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a gift for my son-in-law. He did not like it. In the process of return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No 5l kegs
customer_reviews.text: The item was fine but other than Heineken no one makes 5l kegs anymore. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Pacuska

customer_reviews.title: Very loud
customer_reviews.text: Nice machine. Works nice. Looks good. Kinda big. Easy to assemble, But !!!! It is very loud and I can't get it to go below 47degrees
customer_reviews.author: kenneth johnson

customer_reviews.title: my only negative about the kegerator was there were only ...
customer_reviews.text: my only negative about the kegerator was there were only a few selections of beers brewed that can fit this system.
customer_reviews.author: Bernice McElwain

customer_reviews.title: Kegerator
customer_reviews.text: We have loved this product. Takes a few days for the keg to come to temp.
customer_reviews.author: Dmanning

customer_reviews.title: Use for the first time which is good. When I replace the second CO2
customer_reviews.text: Use for the first time which is good. When I replace the second CO2, it only work for 2 minuets
customer_reviews.author: Ho I. Lung

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: All foam this thing sucks also very hard to get decent beer ...... that then becomes all foam so what is the point
customer_reviews.author: JGF

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece
customer_reviews.text: This mini kegerator didn't come with the heineken adaptor - which makes it useless for my fiancé whom I bought it as a birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: Bummed. I was really looking forward to this, but it was terrible to use. We sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Steve F.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be a great addition to my homebrew mini-kegs. I left it chilling for 5 days and it still won't go below 59F. With the inability to chill you might as well go with a party star tap and put the keg in an ice bucket. The excess foaming others complain about is due to the fact that the kegs are over-pressurized. Took me a few glasses to adjust it and then it worked fine. I'd try to return this, but I've already gotten rid of the packaging. I don't think it will get much use without the ability to cool. The fan is loud but bearable.
customer_reviews.author: daymeeyan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it's great if you love Heineken, but we couldn't find other kegs to go with it
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Dean

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic works well as described
customer_reviews.text: Works well as described. Not that hard to setup, but slightly complicated to unplug and tap non-pressurized kegs. Make sure keg is cold before placing in cooler otherwise it takes 48-72 hours to cool a warm keg. Included is a generous supply of spare parts.
customer_reviews.author: Pathman

customer_reviews.title: great mini keg cooler
customer_reviews.text: works great, some foam at first, don't leave the co2 on and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: stro

customer_reviews.title: I like gifts that work
customer_reviews.text: I like gifts that work! I have yet to hear from support, but it is late. This dispenser appears broken with two springs with no home and the springs are not listed in the manual. Anyway, all set up, went and filled the keg, and then, nothing! The dispenser does not dispense! Just a disappointed gift. I am sure to contact customer support tomorrow, but this sure seems complicated for a glass of draft beer. Must be an easier way!
customer_reviews.author: pensifpoet

customer_reviews.title: Did not cool below 41 degrees
customer_reviews.text: impossible to find beer to fill this. No one would sell you beer so its kind of for people who make there own beer at home. Did not cool below 41 degrees, froze up all the time.( solid ICE ) I even put it at 40 deg and still froze up . returned it in the end
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: While it looks great, the CO2 system is dysfunctional and they offer no tech support!
customer_reviews.text: While it looks great, the CO2 system is dysfunctional, does not hold a charge, leaks and often leaves beer flat after just a couple days. Additionally, the water added refrigeration system causes the keg cans to freeze in the holder making it hard to replace without having to let it thaw.. Poor customer service, have been unable to contact the seller. Too bad, I had really hoped to use it for the upcoming football season. Still not phone number for tech support and no refund or return shipping options...BUYER BEWARE!! Been trying to get a resolution for over 3 months now....NOTHING from Amazon either!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Gaita

customer_reviews.title: great idea- but the beer is just too foamy from ...
customer_reviews.text: great idea- but the beer is just too foamy from a gravity feed beer keg- the regulator does not work well
customer_reviews.author: ling ling chee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my nephew on his 40th birthday. He really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: VICKY L. PARISH

customer_reviews.title: Had to send this back. It never did get ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to send this back. It never did get down to temperature and after a couple days, started steadily climbing back up to over 40 degrees. It was also missing the tap handle when we got it. Definitely not worth the efforts.
customer_reviews.author: KMHBarnett

customer_reviews.title: We had a lot of problems with foaming from this ...
customer_reviews.text: We had a lot of problems with foaming from this machine, and we have used other kegerators before. Also, there is a lot of hassle with having to add water to it and change it on a weekly basis. We sent it back, but the sellers were very cooperative in handling the return.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: Honestly I don't know where the bad reviews came from
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I don't know where the bad reviews came from, I bought this despite them and have had no troubles at all! I home brew and use the 5 liter kegs to avoid bottling, It works great and keeps my beer cold.... Only problem is the o-ring needs to be replaced every cartridge or two and they are hard to find......
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Skip this product
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this through a different website because I thought it was their product and therefore trustworthy. This mini kegerator is terrible and the company's customer service is lacking and slow. I purchased it last November and have spent the entire time since then (10 months) troubleshooting and/or returning the product for repairs. The "new" replacement was clearly a refurbished unit, came with none of the accessory parts (to include the ones I sent in) and is missing the CO2 piercing pin. I'm incredibly frustrated at this point and deeply regretting buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Crowsdoor

customer_reviews.title: Muy Lento
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and I was excited upon receiving it. That quickly gave way to disappointment. Disappointment is the only thing this kegerator delivers quickly. I don’t really have any positive things to say about this. It takes up a lot of room on the counter. It is loud and it is slow. How slow? It is a product that comes with an enlarged prostate. God forbid you are getting a beer during a commercial break, you are better served to simply sit down and let it dribble out while watching your television show and returning to get your beer during the next commercial break. I really really really dislike this product.
customer_reviews.author: CurtB

customer_reviews.title: Foaming...
customer_reviews.text: I reallllly wanted to like this! Unfortunately, the foaming issues are a problem. We wasted $40 on kegs to try and get it to work, & probably got a collective 3 beers out of it in total (after taking the keg out and tapping it by itself). The customer service team for SPT are very friendly and helpful, but that doesn't make this work :( I read that this can use pressurized AND non-pressurized kegs, but the rep told me to only use non-pressurized, which limits the kegs to buy. (& it still didn't work) Hopefully there'll be a new and improved one coming soon because I would love to get something like this again!
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Home brewer
customer_reviews.text: It does keep the cold if you per cool the beer. Biggest complaint is to replace the CO2 it takes me two cartridges before I can get one to seal. I have replace a Ring each time and this seems like the hardest thing to get done very poor charging system.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Wood

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Crap - Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Piece of Crap - Did not work out of the box and can't return because opened after 30 days of purchase. Do Not Buy - I should have read the reviews before purchasing. I'm unhappy that I can't give it less than 1 star
customer_reviews.author: buellmark

customer_reviews.title: Fun accent
customer_reviews.text: I thought that this would be a fun touch for when I have some guests over. It holds 5 liter kegs and the temp adjusts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this. I bought it as a gift for my fiancé. He has since tried two different mini kegs and each time gets nothing but foam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: SPT BD-0538 Mini Kegerator & Dispenser
product_meta.description: In 1993, Sunpentown International (SPT) was founded on the ideal of distributing well trusted appliance brands that offer innovation, value and quality.
feature_bullets: Accepts standard 5 liter kegs and 5L Heineken mini kegs
CO2 pressure control; Three (3) CO2 cartridges included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars74 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
